title: Kenya
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,493 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1020L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and U
description: Kenya is a beautiful African country, filled with many different landforms, diverse wildlife, and more than thirty tribes of people. This book explores the culture, history, and geography that make Kenya such a fascinating place. Detailed maps and vibrant images help bring this book to life.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
